name: Atlantis Attacks
description:
Atlantis is attacking!

How long can you fend off their underwater bio-mechanical horrors with your trusty laser-sub?

==========================================

This is a TOJam2017 - "What Twelves Below" game jam submission by my team: SpaceJamOne

Team members:

Joe Duncan (me), Josh Haberman, Eric Budai, David Mckenna, Rob Ainsley
